scripts.admin:start: pm2 start scripts/admin.dev.yaml && pm2 logs web
scripts.build:only: npm run server:build && npm run web:build
scripts.server:install: cd server && npm install && npm install --only=dev && npm run build && npm prune
scripts.web:install: cd web && npm install && npm install --only=dev && npm run build && npm prune
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run server:install && npm run web:install
